amendment.description: Amendment provides that the Secretary of State shall report to Congress on the flow of people, goods, and services across the international borders shared by the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Bermuda, and the Caribbean region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in Part C of House Report 111-143 to provide that the Secretary of State shall report to Congress on the flow of people, goods, and services across the international borders shared by the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Bermuda, and the Caribbean region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Peters.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
